projects.title: Trustpoint
projects.description: Trustpoint is a project that aims to decentralize and streamline the process of creating deals between gaming studios and celebrities by using smart contracts. Currently, the system for creating deals between gaming studios and celebrities is centralized (on paper), which can be costly, inefficient, and slow. Trustpoint's approach seeks to eliminate intermediaries and increase efficiency by using smart contracts to automate the process.

projects.title: CredQuest
projects.description: CredQuest is a digital reputation network that verifies skills and accomplishments through AI integrations and Soul Bound Credentials. Freelancers can showcase their credentials on the platform's gig marketplace, providing a transparent and reliable representation of their qualifications for potential clients and employers.
